newsTitle: Wall Street’s broadening trade pressures index-tracking billions
content: A long-coveted broadening of the great stock rally would be good news for a slew of active managers and macro bulls
author: Bloomberg
Summary: Wall Street's index-tracking expansion is poised to benefit active managers and macro bulls amid growing trade pressures.

newsTitle: India, Taiwan threaten China's top spot in emerging mkt equity portfolios
content:
As the US rate cycle peaks out, having attractive options in emerging markets is fundamental to any pivoting of capital flows
The Taiex Index and Nifty 50 both trade at about 20 times of forward est… [+4064 chars]
author: Bloomberg
Summary: India and Taiwan are challenging China as leading choices in emerging market equity portfolios as investors seek attractive options with the US rate cycle peaking.
